snippet.title: Hobcaw Barony \- The Belle W. Baruch Foundation
snippet.description:
* Hobcaw Barony \- The Belle W. Baruch Foundation
www.hobcawbarony.org Cached
A non-profit organization and owner of the 17,500-acre wildlife refuge, Hobcaw Barony, originally owned by Bernard Baruch. Includes history, tours and programs.
* Research * Staff Directory * Photo Gallery
* Contact * FAQs * Hobcaw & Plantations

snippet.title: Hobcaw Barony \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description:
* Hobcaw Barony \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hobcaw_Barony Cached
* History| * Hobcaw House...| * Bellefield...| * Slave settlements
Hobcaw Barony is a 16,000 acres (6,475 ha) tract on a peninsula called Waccamaw Neck between the Winyah Bay and the Atlantic Ocean in Georgetown County, South Carolina.
